meanings.definition: Make or cause to make a loud, sharp sound or series of such sounds as metal objects strike together.
meanings.sent1: The pots and pans clanked loudly in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith's hammer clanked against the anvil.
meanings.sent3: The robot clanked around the room, scaring the cat.
meanings.sent4: The chains clanked ominously in the dark dungeon.
meanings.sent5: The old gate clanked shut, sealing off the garden.

meanings.definition: A loud, sharp sound or series of such sounds as metal objects strike together.
meanings.sent1: The clank of the metal chains echoed through the alley.
meanings.sent2: The loud clank of the metal door closing startled everyone.
meanings.sent3: The clank of the pots and pans made a rhythmic beat in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The sudden clank of the sword hitting the ground silenced the room.
meanings.sent5: The clank of the gears turning signaled the start of the machine.
